problems.title: Count Multiples in a Range
problems.description:
You are given three integers L, R, and K. Your task is to count how many integers x in the range [L, R] (inclusive) are divisible by K.

Input Format:
Three space-separated integers L, R, and K.

Output Format:
Print a single integer, the count of integers x in [L, R] such that x is divisible by K.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
1 10 2

Sample Output
5

Explanation:
The numbers are 2, 4, 6, 8, 10.
hintsList: Count multiples of K up to R, then subtract multiples of K up to L-1. Use floor division: count = R/K - (L-1)/K. Be careful with large 64-bit integers.
